QuestData.Title: A Proper Antivenom
QuestData.Description: Shame that Lunk left. I was beginning to enjoy his company.$b$bOh well, back to work!$b$bI'm the closest thing that this expedition has to a medical officer, and I'm running low on antivenom. We tend to need a lot of antivenom.$b$bThe key to a proper antivenom is ALWAYS to start with the poison itself. The glassweb spiders nearby should be a good place to start. If you kill them, you can probably extract some venom from the sacs within their jaws.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well well, you certainly operate quickly! You do have the venom, right?
QuestData.RewardText: This... this is way more than I expected. This will last us for months!
